title: Pakistan introduce AI Immigration App to reduce long queues at airport
description: ISLAMABAD: Interior Minister Mohsin Naqvi on Friday announced the launch of a new Artificial Intelligence (AI)-based application
content:
ISLAMABAD: Interior Minister Mohsin Naqvi on Friday announced the launch of a new Artificial Intelligence (AI)-based application developed by the Federal Investigation Agency (FIA) to make immigration faster and more secure.

title: AI model maps building emissions to support fairer climate policies

title: BBC AI innovator Danijela Horak Joins Epidemic Sound and More Job News
description: BBC AI innovator Danijela Horak joins Epidemic Sound as vp of artificial intelligence, Meta music's Dan Simpson boards DDEX and more music job news.
content: Stockholm-born music library giant Epidemic Sound appointed Danijela Horak as vice president of artificial intelligence, effective Sept. 1. Horak joins from the BBC, where she led AI research and advised the Responsible AI group, launching tools like... [6247 chars]

title: Everyday AI use brings a hidden climate cost
description: As artificial intelligence becomes part of everyday life, its massive energy and water needs are coming into focus.

title: IBM To Drive AI-Powered Managed Services Transformation At Vi
description: Vi (Vodafone Idea) and IBM have announced a collaboration that aims to streamline operations, improve service reliability, enhance customer experience, and accelerate digital initiatives, using artificial intelligence (AI) and the implementation of a unified DevOps execution model fuelled by automation. As part of this, an AI Innovation Hub will be established to modernise Vi’s IT and business processes.
